```{r}
# clear workspace
rm(list = ls())

# load libraries
library(dplyr)
library(DescTools)
library(ggpubr)
library(FSA)
library(multcomp)
library(car)

# working directory
wd <- list()
# commonly used paths in my working directory
wd$data <- "../../Data_Processed/LatB"
wd$results <- "../../Results/LatB_ANOVA"

# list all csv files in the directory
filelist <- list.files(path = wd$data, pattern = "*.csv")

options("encoding" = "UTF-8")
```

```{r}
# select a method for which the analysis is performed
# (1) - DC, (2) - RTDC, (3) - SMR
i = 1
exp.string <-
    substr(x = filelist[i],
           start = 1,
           stop = (nchar(filelist[i]) - 20))
method <-
    substr(x = exp.string,
           start = 6,
           stop = nchar(exp.string))

#Create txt summary file
summary.file.path <-
    file.path(wd$results, paste("RSummary_", exp.string, "_RD.txt" , sep = ""))

#Create pdf file for plots
plot.file <-
    file.path(wd$results,
              paste("RSummary_", exp.string, "_RD_Plots.pdf" , sep = ""))

#print intro
intro <-
    paste(
        "Analysis is performed for all replicates of LatB treatments measured with",
        method,
        "for parameter Realtive Deformability"
    )
# Open summary.file
summary.file <- file(summary.file.path, "wb")
write(noquote(intro), file = summary.file)
cat(intro)

# select color scheme
plot.colors.all <- read.csv(file = "../plot_colors_shades.csv",
                            header = TRUE,
                            stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
if (grepl("SMR", method)) {
    plot.colors <- plot.colors.all$SMR
} else if (grepl("RT", method))  {
    plot.colors <- plot.colors.all$RTDC
} else {
    plot.colors <- plot.colors.all$DC
}
```

```{r}
#Read data
data <-
    read.delim(file = file.path(wd$data, filelist[i]),
               header = TRUE,
               sep = ",")

write(" ", file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
write("Overview of data groups", file = summary.file, append = TRUE)

#print data summary
v <- group_by(data, factor) %>%
    summarise(
        count = n(),
        mean = format(mean(Relative_Deformability, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 5),
        sd = format(sd(Relative_Deformability, na.rm = TRUE), digits = 3)
    )
write.table(
    v,
    file = summary.file,
    append = TRUE,
    quote = FALSE,
    sep = "\t",
    eol = "\n",
    na = "NA",
    dec = ".",
    row.names = FALSE,
    col.names = TRUE,
    qmethod = c("escape", "double"),
    fileEncoding = ""
)
write(" ", file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
capture.output(v, file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
```


```{r}
# Have a look at the data
# Box Plot
plot.order <- c("ctrl", "tr1", "tr2", "tr3", "tr4", "tr5", "tr6")

gg1 <- ggboxplot(
    data,
    x = "factor",
    y = "Relative_Deformability",
    color = "factor",
    palette = plot.colors,
    order = plot.order,
    ylab = "RD",
    xlab = "Treatment"
)
print(gg1)
```

```{r}
# Have a look at the data
# Line Plot connecting means, jitter of medians
gg2 <- ggline(data,
              x = "factor",
              y = "Relative_Deformability",
              add = c("mean_se", "jitter"),
              order = plot.order,
              ylab = "RD",
              xlab = "Treatment")
print(gg2)
```

```{r}
# Compute the analysis of variance
res.aov <- aov(Relative_Deformability ~ factor, data = data)

#Check the assumptions for analysis of variance
# 1. Homogeneity of variances
plot(res.aov, 1)
w <- leveneTest(Relative_Deformability ~ factor, data = data)
print(w)
capture.output(w, file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
cat("\n\n", file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Check the assumptions for analysis of variance
# 2. Normality
plot(res.aov, 2)
gg3 <- ggqqplot(data$Relative_Deformability, main = "Quantile-Quantile Plot, ggqqplot")
print(gg3)
```

```{r}
# Summary of the analysis
introAOV <- "Summary of AOV, Relative_Deformability ~ factor"
u <- summary(res.aov)
cat(introAOV, "\n", "\n")
print(u)
write(noquote(introAOV), file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
capture.output(u, file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
write(" ", file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Perform the post-hoc analysis
h <-
    pairwise.t.test(
        data$Relative_Deformability,
        data$LatB,
        p.adjust.method = "BH",
        pool.sd = TRUE
    )
capture.output(h, file = summary.file, append = TRUE)
print(h)
# Close summary.file
close(summary.file)
```

```{r}
# Save plots to pdf
pdf(plot.file)
print(gg1)
print(gg2)
plot(res.aov, 1)
plot(res.aov, 2)
print(gg3)
dev.off()
```
